-1.title: Whitney and Britni Supervise a Pool Party
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Whitney and Britni Hicks are two Southern sisters-in-law who are navigating #MomLife in the Deep South. After stumbling upon the Internet self help challenge, Be Your Best You, Whitney and Britni decide to participate. Through a series of webcam confessionals the women log their triumphs, set-backs and frustrations with themselves...and each other. While balancing grocery lists, date nights and carpools, Whitney and Britni struggle to "have it all" in the world of modern motherhood.
imdb.title: Whitney and Britni
plot: _Whitney and Britni_ (qv) Hicks are two Southern sisters-in-law who are navigating #MomLife in the Deep South. After stumbling upon the Internet self help challenge, Be Your Best You, _Whitney and Britni_ (qv) decide to participate. Through a series of webcam confessionals the women log their triumphs, set-backs and frustrations with themselves...and each other. While balancing grocery lists, date nights and carpools, _Whitney and Britni_ (qv) struggle to "have it all" in the world of modern motherhood.
